sense.name: 信息, information
sense.commentary: An information is something about news, facts, or knowledge.
sense.examples:
我们得到了很多有用的信息. We gained much useful information.
劳动力市场信息. labour market information
这本书有很多新信息。 The book contains much new information.

sense.name: 信息, message
sense.commentary: Amessage is a main idea that an artist, writer, speaker, or group is trying to communicate.
sense.examples:
信息处理。 message processing.
这本书传递一种信息。 A book with a message .
这个电影的信息是只有最凶狠的人才能在政治斗争中获胜. The message of the movie seems tobe that only the most ruthless peoploe can get ahead in politics.

sense.name: 信息, data
sense.commentary: Adata is an information collected for use.
sense.examples:
信息传输。 data transmission.
信息存储。 data storage.
他们有医疗,教育,和 经济发展的信息. They had data on health, education, and econommic development.
